description: balding older man with wavy beard, resting on hilt of a sword in his PR hand and his PL hand on a small book; text at bottom:  "XII. / ET VITAM AETERNAM AMEN."

title: Saint Matthias, Plate 13 from the series Christ, the Twelve Apostles, and Saint Paul
